synopsis: Asuka, Kyouko, and Mirai are scouted by a talking gorilla to become idols! But their idol training seems to consist mostly of working in an arcade... and saving the world?!
The Crane Game Girls learn their first secret training technique: The Slide!
The wannabe idols try to learn the trick to retrieving box-type prizes from the crane game. But does Mirai know a faster way?
The girls attempt the "Niagara Drop," a crane game technique for securing many small prizes at once.
As the asteroids draw closer to the planet, Mirai must invoke her family fishing skills to master the tag grab technique!
It's time for the girls to learn the secret of their mission... but only if they can master the trick of catching a prize by the string!
When the girls learn they've been crane gaming under false pretenses, will they knuckle under to save the Earth? Or will they leave it to its fate?!
Asuka and Kyouko have decided to keep playing crane games to save the Earth, but Mirai is determined to leave! Can CEO Gorilla make a bargain to save the day?

The Crane Game Girls take a relaxing rest at a hot springs, but their vacation is cut short when Boss Gorilla runs into an old rival. Can they master the new gap-grabbing technique and win the sexy gorilla prize?

The Crane Game Girls' identities have been revealed to the world, and they're well on their way to becoming the idols they dreamed they'd be... but only if they can master a new technique without the boss's advice!
The boss has been kidnapped and a final asteroid is approaching the Earth, bigger than any before it! Can they pull off a final crane game technique big enough to save the day?!
The Crane Game Girls learn of one last way to change the asteroid's course... but will it cost them their lives to do it?!
The Crane Game Girls use the last of their power on the Dark Gorilla asteroid! Can they survive? And what of the fate of their boss?!
